duration.description: The amount of seconds the entity should burn.
duration.markdownDescription: The amount of seconds the entity should burn.

type.description:
## Set On Fire

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/set_on_fire)

Sets the entity on fire for the specified amount of time in seconds.

Type ID: `origins:set_on_fire`




---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:set_on_fire",
    "duration": 5
}
```

This example will set the entity on fire for 5 seconds.
